page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content: Leisure facilities in Birtley include a library, swimming baths, Bingo Hall, a snooker club, tennis court, a bowling green, several public houses, and a community centre. A new Youth Centre is to be opened at Lord Lawson Comprehensive School. Improvements are being made at the swimming baths, a water slide has been added and playthings have been introduced. It is felt that there is not enough for young people to do and more Youth Clubs, Adventure play areas, sports fields and a cinema would be an improvement. There is a jazz band, the Birtley Grenadiers, which is very popular and entertaining. In years to come Birtley is scheduled to have a new district Leisure Centre.
